CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(LOB__c) = 'FVA', Expected_Travel_cost__c + Expected_F_B_cost__c + Any_additional_cost_Specify__c, IF(TEXT(LOB__c) = 'CF', Expected_Airfare_Cost__c + Expected_Lodging_Cost__c + Expected_Registration_Fee__c + Expected_F_B_cost__c + Any_additional_cost_Specify__c, 0) )
CustomField.label: Total Budget Requested
